name: In The Dark (itch) (Munch333)
description:
In The Dark is a horror game I made for the UDC Game Jam #21, It is the first game I made for a game jam and it revolves around the theme "darkness" with your character in an unlit house with their only source of light being your flashlight.

CONTROLS:

WASD to Move

Space to Jump

Ctrl to Crounch
